refsect1.title: Proposal
refsect1.para: Change the method name of AtomType.getID() into AtomType.getAtomTypeName() and add two new methods ChemObject.getID() and .setID().

refsect1.title: Reason
refsect1.para: This would allow to put a getID() method into the ChemObject class, which would resemble the id concept in XML files, where an elements id is a unique code to this object, like the hashcode in Java. However, a hashcode is not to be set manually, for this I have the get/setID() method in mind.
